skills.name: Deadly Blow
skills.description: Unleashes a fatal blow on an enemy, disturbing the target's HP recovery for 2 turns with a 50% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%

Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skills.name: Deadly Wave
skills.description: Inflicts damage proportionate to your HP to all enemies and weakens their Attack Power for 2 turns with a 75% chance on each target.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.2*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Trade
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, reviving 1 ally Monster with 30% HP if the enemy is eliminated by this attack. If there is no revivable ally on the field, all allies will receive a damage absorbing shield for 2 turns. The amount of absorption differs according to your Monster's level.

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage
